enabled-console-msg: Festival now enabled, English selected (adjust with /fe lang <en/nl/es/pl>).
cmd-ingameonly-msg: Festival command only to be used in-game.
cmd-noperms-msg: You can not use this Festival command
cmd-noperms-subcommand: You do not have permission to use this subcommand.
make-pos1: Please place or break the first position.
make-pos2: Please place or break the second position.
give-area-name: Please specify a name for this area.
in-unknown-area: You are in an unknown area
area-no-area-to-edit: There are no areas that you can edit
area-name-excist: An area with that name already exists.
whitelist-specify-action: Please specify a valid action. Usage: /area whitelist <areaname> <add/list/remove> <playername>
desc-write-usage: Please write the description. Usage /fe desc <areaname> <..>
desc-specify-area: Please specify an area to edit the description. Usage: /fe desc <areaname> <desc>
specify-to-delete: Please specify an area to delete.
flag-not-found-list: Flag not found. (Flags: god, pvp, flight, edit, touch, animals, mobs, effects, msg, passage, drop, tnt, shoot, hunger, perms, falldamage)
flag-not-specified-list: Please specify a flag. (Flags: god, pvp, flight, edit, touch, animals, mobs, effects, msg, passage, drop, tnt, shoot, hunger, perms, falldamage)
specify-to-flag: Please specify the area you would like to flag.
specify-excisting-area-name: Please specify an existing Area name.
edit-id-or-other: , edit this id or use another id
cmd-specify-id-and-command-usage: Please specify the command ID and command string to add. Usage: /fe command <areaname> add <COMMANDID> <COMMANDSTRING>
cmd-valid-areaname: Area not found, please submit a valid name. Usage: /fe command <areaname> <add/list/edit/del> <commandID> <commandstring>.
cmd-id-not-found: Command ID not found. See the commands with /fe event command <areaname> list'
cmd-specify-id-to-delete: Please specify the command ID to delete. Usage /fe event command <areaname> del <COMMANDID>
cmd-specify-action: Please add an action to perform with command.  Usage: /fe command <areaname> <add/list/edit/del> <commandID> <commandstring>.
all-players-are-god: All players are God in this Area!
no-pvp-area: You are in a No-PVP Area!
option-missing-in-config: option missing in config.yml, now set to
flag-missing-in-config: flag defaults missing, now set to
barrier-is-passage-flag: Old Barrier config was used, now set to 'false'; please rename 'Barrier' to 'Passage' in config.yml
no-is-falldamage-flag: Old NoFalldamage config was used, now set to 'false'; please rename 'NoFalldamage' to 'Falldamage' in config.yml
